Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-39908 affecting package ruby for versions less than 3.1.7-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-39908 affecting package ruby for versions less than 3.1.7-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package ruby is earlier than 3.1.7-1, affected by CVE-2024-39908
